synopsis.text: Pokemon's beloved characters Satoshi and Pikachu find themselves in an unexpected journey when a fierce battle leads them into a mysterious light, transporting them to a strange and unfamiliar place. Desperate to return to their original world, they chase Celebi, the only hope to find their way back. This thrilling adventure is the centerpiece of "A Ripple in Time," a collaborative animation between the iconic Pokemon franchise and renowned artist Daniel Arsham. Directed by Kunihiko Yuyama, the chief director of the original Pocket Monsters anime, this animated short was first unveiled at Arsham's 'A Ripple in Time' art exhibition in Tokyo, with a minute-long preview previously released on Pokemon's official YouTube channel on January 27, 2022.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
